name: Emperor of Pinland
description:
Emperor of Pinland is an adventure puzzle game where you are completing challenges in order to become the next Emperor of Pinland. You will have to navigate levels on the beach, the city, and in the Grand Arena while using magnets, teleporters, and the ability to split yourself into two to succeed.

Credits: Created by Daniel Shiffman, Michael Guastalla, Brian Shields, and Gene Chu, with musical contribution by Noah Meyers
